thread.title: In New England, Shale Gas Is Hard to Get
thread.title_full: In New England, Shale Gas Is Hard to Get - WSJ

author: Cassandra Sweet
title: In New England, Shale Gas Is Hard to Get
text:
Natural gas is so abundant and cheap in much of the U.S. that producers want to export it overseas. Except in New England, where gas is so hard to get that companies are importing it from as far away as Yemen.
The U.S. shale boom that has produced a glut of gas—and helped lower many Americans’ home heating bills—has largely bypassed the energy-starved New England. Few pipelines are available to ferry gas from Pennsylvania and Ohio to...
